about_the_game:
Climb aboard an eclectic mix of authentic and detailed Ge 4/4 II locomotives in celebratory liveries, and experience the wintry Alps from the classic observation coach, with Rivet Games’ RhB Anniversary Collection for the challenging Arosalinie.

First built in 1973, the Ge 4/4 II was designed as a capable replacement to the older and unreliable Ge 6/6 I. More would be introduced in 1984, making a total of 23 locomotives to serve the Rhaetian Railway’s core network. In 1997, the Ge 4/4 II fleet was permitted to work along the famed Arosa Line, as the 25 km mountain railway was converted to the same overhead system as the rest of the RhB network. The Ge 4/4 II’s power output was ideal for the sharp grades and ever-growing traffic, and they would easily transport passengers and freight throughout the valley.

While the standard RhB red livery is applied across the fleet, multiple locomotives instead carry promotional designs that celebrate the long heritage of the nation’s railway network. Featuring large artistic representations of key landmarks, locomotives such as no. 627 proudly call out the 100th anniversary of the Arosa Line, with others showing off the Bernina or Disentis lines, and even a 125th anniversary loco for the RhB itself.

For use on the Arosalinie, Rivet Games have produced this collection which features 5 distinctive liveries for the Ge 4/4 II locomotive. For additional variety, RhB’s white and yellow observation coach is included. A new timetable and 5 engaging scenarios let you put the locos to work across mixed-traffic duties, and get in the Christmas spirit with festive-themed gameplay featuring atmospheric scenery and light effects, including across the grand Langwieser Viaduct!

Key Features


  • Ge 4/4 II Electric Locomotive in the following liveries:
    • No. 619 “100 years Bernina 1910-2010“
    • No. 620 “100 years Bever-Scuol 1913-2013“
    • No. 623 “125 years RhB 1889-2014“
    • No. 627 “100 years Chur-Arosa 1914-2014“
    • No. 630 “100 years Chur-Disentis 1912-2012“
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs with accurate true-to-life performance and handling
  • RhB Observation Coach in Yellow and White livery
  • Additional Journey Mode chapter for Arosalinie
  • Accessible Training Module and 5 detailed and engaging scenarios for Arosalinie, complete
  • Adds additional timetable to Arosalinie
  • Christmas-themed gameplay with festive scenery and lighting
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 161.1mb
